document.docAuthor: Pang, Hong, Ślipiński, Adam, U, Yap Ing W & Zuo, Yongsheng
document.masterDocTitle: Contribution to the knowledge of Chinese Epilachna Chevrolat with descriptions of new species (Coleoptera: Coccinellidae: Epilachnini)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Contribution to the knowledge of Chinese Epilachna Chevrolat with descriptions of new species (Coleoptera: Coccinellidae: Epilachnini)
